analyzed: du:khatstshe da ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa'o //
translated: Dukha-chheda means cutting afflictions.üîΩ)üîΩ The meaning of the mantra is as follows:

analyzed: pradzny'a dzny'a na shes rab ye shes te thugs so //

analyzed: de lta bu nyams su blangs pa las /

analyzed: chags pa che zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o // chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //

analyzed: des tha dad kyi rtog pa gcod pas na mtshon no //

translated: ‚ÄúHolder‚Äù means that Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´ possesses it.

analyzed: mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul @179a * //
translated: The ‚Äúgreat clarity‚Äù is the dharmakƒÅya.

analyzed: chen po 'chang // zhes pa ni mkhas pa ni 'gro ba'i don la mkhas pa ste sprul sku'o //
translated: The ‚Äúgreat illusion‚Äù is the nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha'i sgo nas don grub pa'o //

analyzed: zhes pa ni bskyed rdzogs thun mong gi sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //

analyzed: de'i bdag po ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste gtso bo zhes bya'o //

analyzed: chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs te 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //

original: 'chang ba'i mchog ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'chang ba'i mchog ni ye shes sems dpa'o //

original: bzod pa ni gsum ste gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos la nges par sems dpa'i bzod pa'o //

translated: Patience is threefold: the patience of not taking offense at harmdoers, the patience of voluntarily enduring suffering, and the patience of certainty with regard to the Dharma.

original: chen zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: chen zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúgreat‚Äù means that the three spheres are not apprehended, and so it is supramundane.

original: 'chang ba ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'chang ba ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúbearer‚Äù is the wisdom being.

original: brtan pa po zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: brtan pa po zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Steadfast‚Äù means unchanging.

original: brtson 'grus la gsum ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus la gsum ste /

original: go cha'i brtson 'grus dang / spyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: go cha'i brtson 'grus dang / spyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so //

analyzed: brtul ba yin zhes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis 'khor ba las brtul ba'o //

original: bsam gtan la gnyis te zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan la gnyis te zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ngo //

original: zhi gnas ni dmigs pa rtse gcig pa'o ;
analyzed: zhi gnas ni dmigs pa rtse gcig pa'o ;

original: / lhag mthong ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag gis stong pa'o //
analyzed: / lhag mthong ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag gis stong pa'o //

original: chen po zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: chen po zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat‚Äù means that it is supramundane, since it does not objectify the three spheres.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnas zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMeditative stabilization‚Äù means that it is endowed with the wisdom being.

original: shes rab la gnyis te rgyu'i shes rab dang 'bras bu'i @179b shes rab bo //
analyzed: shes rab la gnyis te rgyu'i shes rab dang 'bras bu'i @179b shes rab bo //

original: rgyu'i shes rab ni thos bsam sgom gsum mo //
analyzed: rgyu'i shes rab ni thos bsam sgom gsum mo //

original: 'bras bu'i shes rab ni don phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i shes rab ni don phyin ci ma log pa'o //

original: chen po ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: chen po ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat‚Äù means that it is supramundane, since it does not objectify the three spheres.

original: lus 'chang ba zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' la'o //
analyzed: lus 'chang ba zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEmbodiment‚Äù means that it is endowed with the wisdom being.

original: stobs zhes pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs te bcu'o //
analyzed: stobs zhes pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs te bcu'o //
translated: Power means the ten powers, which are powers that cannot be overcome by others.

original: che zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: che zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: Great means beyond the world, which is the non-apprehension of the three spheres.

original: thabs shes rab ni theg pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: thabs shes rab ni theg pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o //

original: che zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: che zhes pa ni 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'o //

original: smon lam zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: smon lam zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i don 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: ye shes zhes pa ni ji lta ba mkhyen pa dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ste /

original: rgya mtsho zhes pa mi zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o /

original: / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: / rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan //
translated: He is the one endowed with the power of great magic,

original: drag po chen po ni ye shes sems dpa'o //

translated: The great wrathful one is the j√±ƒÅnasattva.

analyzed: drag shul che zhes pa ni drag po'i las kyis 'dul ba'o //
translated: The great fierce one is the taming through wrathful activity.

original: 'jigs chen zhes pa ni @180a * //
analyzed: 'jigs chen zhes pa ni @180a * //
translated: The great frightening one is

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa'o //

analyzed: 'jigs par byed ces bya ba ni mtha' dang bral ba'i ye shes ston pa'o //

original: mgon po ni mgon byed pa'o //
analyzed: mgon po ni mgon byed pa'o //
translated: The protector is the one who protects.

original: rigs zhes pa ni lnga'o //
analyzed: rigs zhes pa ni lnga'o //

analyzed: mchog ces pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o // bla ni sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'o //
translated: The supreme one is the j√±ƒÅnasattva.

analyzed: ma ni de 'byin pa'o //
translated: The mother is the one who gives birth to that.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa gang zhe na / gsang sngags chen po'i mchog ste mtha' dang bral ba'o //

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the method of the MahƒÅyƒÅna,

original: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //

original: zhes pa ni rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mtshon pa'o //
translated: This refers to the mandala of the five families.

original: sangs rgyas ni spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ste chos sku'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ste chos sku'o //
translated: Buddha is the perfect abandonment and the perfect wisdom, which is the Dharma Body.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa ste longs sku'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa ni mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa ste longs sku'o //
translated: Vairocana is the one who is adorned with the major and minor marks, which is the Enjoyment Body.

original: mdzad che zhes pa ni mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa ste sprul sku'o //
analyzed: mdzad che zhes pa ni mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa ste sprul sku'o //
translated: Great deeds refers to the performance of the benefit of beings through the twelve deeds, which is the Emanation Body.

original: thub pa chen pho zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa chen pho zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'o //
translated: The great sage is called Shakyamuni.

original: thub chen ldan zhes pa ni sh'akya thub pa'i yon tan dang yang ye shes sems dpa' la ldan zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: thub chen ldan zhes pa ni sh'akya thub pa'i yon tan dang yang ye shes sems dpa' la ldan zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Endowed with the great sage means that the wisdom being is endowed with the qualities of Shakyamuni.

original: gsang sngags tshul chen zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The great way of mantra is the stage of development and the stage of completion.

original: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa ni phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / nang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa ni phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / nang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stage of development is the outer stage of development, the inner stage of development, and the profound stage of development.

original: phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha mang ngam nyung yang rung ste lha rkyang pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: phyi bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha mang ngam nyung yang rung ste lha rkyang pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The outer stage of development is the meditation on a single deity, whether many or few deities.

original: nang bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha kha sbyor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: nang bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha kha sbyor bsgom pa'o //
translated: The inner stage of development is the meditation on the union of the deity.

original: zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rtsi rlung bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rtsi rlung bsgom pa'o //
translated: The profound stage of development is the meditation on the vital essence and energy currents.

original: de dag thams cad la rang bzhin med par shes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad la rang bzhin med par shes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The knowledge that all of these lack any nature is the stage of completion.

original: las byung zhes pa sku gsum mo //
analyzed: las byung zhes pa sku gsum mo //
translated: The result is the three buddha bodies.

original: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
translated: The great way of mantra is the nature of the three buddha bodies.

original: zhes pa ni bskyed rdzogs thun mong gi bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' khyod la ldan no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni bskyed rdzogs thun mong gi bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' khyod la ldan no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that you possess the awareness being, which is the nature common to the stages of development and completion.

original: da ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa bcu dang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sog nas bstod pa bstan te pha rol phyin bcu ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: da ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa bcu dang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sog nas bstod pa bstan te pha rol phyin bcu ni bshad zin to //
translated: Now, the praise from the point of view of the perfections, the ten stages, and the inconceivable virtues is taught. The ten perfections have already been explained.

original: thob pa ye shes sems dpa' khyod kyis thob ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: thob pa ye shes sems dpa' khyod kyis thob ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of you have attained is that you have attained the knowledge being.

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the ten perfections,

original: zhes pa ni gnas @180b nas 'gro ba'i don byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gnas @180b nas 'gro ba'i don byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: means acting for the benefit of beings from the state of abiding, which is the meaning.

original: ngag pa ste zhes bya ba ni pha rol phyin pa thams cad dbyer med du rtogs pa'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ngag pa ste zhes bya ba ni pha rol phyin pa thams cad dbyer med du rtogs pa'o zhes bya'o //
translated: The word indeed means realizing the inseparability of all perfections.

original: tshul zhes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu 'gro ba la ston pa'o //
analyzed: tshul zhes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu 'gro ba la ston pa'o //
translated: The word method means teaching the ten perfections to beings.

original: mgon po ni ye shes sems dpa'o //üîΩsa bcu'i dbang phyug ces pa ni sa bcu la dbang thob pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mgon po ni ye shes sems dpa'o // sa bcu'i dbang phyug ces pa ni sa bcu la dbang thob pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The protector is the knowledge being.üîΩThe word lord of the ten stages means attaining mastery over the ten stages.

original: gnas pa po zhes bya ba ni sa bcu pa la gnas nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa po zhes bya ba ni sa bcu pa la gnas nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: The word abiding means acting for the benefit of beings from abiding on the tenth stage.

original: shes bcu zhes pa ni chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang ; kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
analyzed: shes bcu zhes pa ni chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang ; kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang /
translated: The ten knowledges are the knowledge of phenomena, the subsequent knowledge, the knowledge of others' minds, the conventional knowledge, the knowledge of suffering, the knowledge of origin, the knowledge of cessation,

original: lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of the path, the knowledge of elimination, and the knowledge of nonarising.

original: rnam dag ces pa ni /
analyzed: rnam dag ces pa ni /
translated: Pure means

original: nyan thos kyi shes pa bcu rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi shes pa bcu rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
translated: knowing the ten knowledges of the ≈õrƒÅvakas to be devoid of inherent nature.

original: bdag nyid can zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid can zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The nature means the j√±ƒÅnasattva.

original: rnam pa bcu po zhes pa ni gcig pur 'dzin pa dang / rgyur 'dzin pa dang / za bar 'dzin pa dang / byed pa por 'dzin pa dang / rang dbang can du 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par 'dzin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu po zhes pa ni gcig pur 'dzin pa dang / rgyur 'dzin pa dang / za bar 'dzin pa dang / byed pa por 'dzin pa dang / rang dbang can du 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs par 'dzin pa dang /
translated: The ten aspects means grasping as one, grasping as a cause, grasping as an enjoyer, grasping as an agent, grasping as independent, grasping as permanent, grasping as afflicted,

original: rnam par byang bar 'dzin pa dang / rnal 'byor can du 'dzin pa dang / ma grol ba grol bar 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par byang bar 'dzin pa dang / rnal 'byor can du 'dzin pa dang / ma grol ba grol bar 'dzin pa'o //

original: don bcu'i don ni mu stegs kyi don bcu po de yang ye shes sems dpas khong du chud ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don bcu'i don ni mu stegs kyi don bcu po de yang ye shes sems dpas khong du chud ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the ten topics is that the meaning of the ten topics of the tƒ´rthikas is also comprehended by the j√±ƒÅnasattva.

original: thub dbang ni thub pa'i dbang po ste bdud bzhi thub pa'o //
analyzed: thub dbang ni thub pa'i dbang po ste bdud bzhi thub pa'o //
translated: The lord of sages is the lord of sages, the conqueror of the four mƒÅras.

original: stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / rnam par thar pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / rnam par thar pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
translated: The ten powers are the power of knowing what is possible and impossible, the power of knowing various interests, the power of knowing various temperaments, the power of knowing the superior and inferior faculties of beings, the power of knowing the path that leads everywhere, the power of knowing the practice of all forms of meditation, the power of knowing the afflictions of others, the power of knowing the purification of all afflictions, the power of knowing the recollection of past lives, and the power of knowing death and rebirth.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dad skye ba shes pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dad skye ba shes pa'i stobs dang /
translated: the power of knowing death, transition, and rebirth,

original: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //üîΩde ltar stobs bcus 'gro ba'i don byed pas na khyab pa'i bdag / kun gyi don ni @181a * //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so // de ltar stobs bcus 'gro ba'i don byed pas na khyab pa'i bdag / kun gyi don ni @181a * //
translated: and the power of knowing the exhaustion of defilements.üîΩSince he benefits migrating beings with these ten powers, he is the all-pervading lord.

original: ma lus byed //
analyzed: ma lus byed //
translated: He performs the complete benefit of all.

original: ces bya'o // 'o na 'gro ba'i don byed pa la skyon gyis ma gos sam zhe na /
analyzed: ces bya'o // 'o na 'gro ba'i don byed pa la skyon gyis ma gos sam zhe na /

original: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
analyzed: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
translated: he is the great one who possesses the ten powers.

original: zhes smos te dbang bcu ni tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
analyzed: zhes smos te dbang bcu ni tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
translated: The ten masteries are mastery over life, mastery over action, mastery over requisites, mastery over devotion, mastery over prayer, mastery over transformation, mastery over knowledge, mastery over intuition, mastery over Dharma, and mastery over the elements.

original: chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / dbang bcu dang ldan pas skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
analyzed: chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / dbang bcu dang ldan pas skyon gyis ma gos pa'o //
translated: Endowed with these ten masteries, he is unstained by faults.

original: da ni sku gsum gyi sgo nas bstod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni sku gsum gyi sgo nas bstod par bya ste /

original: dang po chos kyi sku'i sgo nas bstod par bya ste /
analyzed: dang po chos kyi sku'i sgo nas bstod par bya ste /
translated: First he is praised in terms of the body of Dharma.

original: thog ma med ces pa ni rgyus stong pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma med ces pa ni rgyus stong pa'o //
translated: Without beginning means empty of cause.

original: spros med bdag ces pa ni skyon dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: spros med bdag ces pa ni skyon dang bral ba'o //

original: de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag / ces pa ni rang gi ngo bos stong pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag / ces pa ni rang gi ngo bos stong pa'o //
translated: Suchness is the pure self means empty of its own entity.

original: bden par smra zhing zhes pa ni longs sku ste bden par smras pa ni theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bden par smra zhing zhes pa ni longs sku ste bden par smras pa ni theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Speaking the truth means the body of enjoyment, speaking the truth being the Great Vehicle.

original: tshig mi 'gyur zhes pa ni bden pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshig mi 'gyur zhes pa ni bden pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúunchanging words‚Äù means ‚Äútrue reality.‚Äù

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
translated: ‚ÄúHe does what he says‚Äù

original: ces pa ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ste sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dag go //
analyzed: ces pa ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ste sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dag go //
translated: refers to the perfection of retinue, which is the bodhisattvas on the ten levels.

original: gnyis med ces pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med ces pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNondual‚Äù means that ultimate reality and conventional reality are inseparable.

original: de thugs su chud nas 'gro ba la yang gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
analyzed: de thugs su chud nas 'gro ba la yang gnyis su med par ston pa'o //
translated: Having realized that, he teaches beings that they are nondual.

original: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
translated: ‚ÄúHe abides in the limit of reality‚Äù

original: zhes pa ni rgyud 'di'i lta ba ston pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgyud 'di'i lta ba ston pa'i tshig yin te /

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni don phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni don phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: The limit of reality is the undistorted meaning.

original: de'i rig pa yul na mi gnas pa dang / rgyud dang bstan bcos kun gyi yul du mi gnas pa dang blo las 'das pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i rig pa yul na mi gnas pa dang / rgyud dang bstan bcos kun gyi yul du mi gnas pa dang blo las 'das pa'o ;
translated: The knowledge of that does not abide in an object, does not abide in the domain of the tantras and treatises, and is beyond the intellect.

original: / bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan / zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: / bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan / zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHe has the lion‚Äôs roar of selflessness‚Äù refers to the nirmƒÅ·πáakƒÅya.

original: gang zag gi bdag dang chos kyi bdag med pa'i sgra ste seng ge dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: gang zag gi bdag dang chos kyi bdag med pa'i sgra ste seng ge dang 'dra ste /
translated: The sound of the selflessness of persons and phenomena is like a lion.

original: dper na gcan zan gyi rgyal po seng ge des sgra bsgrags pa tsam gyis ri dgas ma lus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jigs par byed do //
analyzed: dper na gcan zan gyi rgyal po seng ge des sgra bsgrags pa tsam gyis ri dgas ma lus pa thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'jigs par byed do //
translated: For example, just by the mere roar of the king of beasts, the lion, all the deer are overwhelmed and terrified.

analyzed: de bzhin du ye shes sems dpa'i bdag med pa'i sgra des ri dgas ngan pa dang 'dra ba'i mu stegs 'jigs par byed do //

analyzed: kun du 'gro zhes pa ni phyogs dang dus thams cad du gshegs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Omnipresent‚Äù means going to all directions and times.

translated: ‚Äú Effective‚Äù means going for the benefit of beings.

analyzed: stobs zhes pa ni stobs @181b bcus don byed pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs //

analyzed: zhes pa ni 'gro ba'i don la myur ba'o //

translated: ‚Äú Victor‚Äù refers to the ≈õrƒÅvakas.

analyzed: rnam rgyal zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Conqueror‚Äù refers to the bodhisattvas.

analyzed: dgra las rgyal zhes pa ni sgrib pa mtha' dag zad pa ste sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: rje zhes pa ni longs sku ste rnam par snang mdzad lta bu'o //

analyzed: tshogs zhes pa dang // bdag ces pa ni mtha' dang bral ba'i ye shes te chos kyi sku'o //

analyzed: rje zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //

original: 'dir rgyal ba 'o na ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni rgyu rkyen thams cad dang bral ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dir rgyal ba 'o na ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni rgyu rkyen thams cad dang bral ba yin la /

original: de ni ma yin te ye shes sems dpa' nyid srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du byung ba las ma gtogs pa skye gnas med ces pa ste skye gnas kyi rnyog pa med do //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te ye shes sems dpa' nyid srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du byung ba las ma gtogs pa skye gnas med ces pa ste skye gnas kyi rnyog pa med do //
translated: This is not so, because apart from the jnana being itself arising in the nature of the three existences, there is no birth, so there is no impurity of birth.

original: 'o na srid gsum skye ba med pa ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin na blo'i yul du song ba ste /
analyzed: 'o na srid gsum skye ba med pa ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin na blo'i yul du song ba ste /

analyzed: dngos po'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na de ni ma yin te /

original: chos ni 'khor 'das thams cad do //

analyzed: las byung ba zhes pa ni thams cad rten 'brel las byung ba'i phyir ngo bo skye ba med pas na /

analyzed: srid pa sel zhes pa ni dngos po'i rnyog pa med do //

original: yang rgal ba dang / 'o na chos thams cad skye med yin na /
analyzed: yang rgal ba dang / 'o na chos thams cad skye med yin na /
translated: Well, if all phenomena are unborn,

original: chos can re re la skye med re yod pas du ma'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can re re la skye med re yod pas du ma'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: there is an unborn for each phenomenon, so there is a muddle of many, you might say.üîΩBut that is not so.

original: chos can du ma tha dad kyang ngo bo skye med du gcig pas na /
analyzed: chos can du ma tha dad kyang ngo bo skye med du gcig pas na /
translated: Although there are many different phenomena, they are all the same in being unborn by nature.üîΩSo it is said thatüîΩthere is a single, solid, vajra nature,

original: gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / ces pa ste du ma'i rnyog pa med do //
analyzed: gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / ces pa ste du ma'i rnyog pa med do //
translated: and there is no muddle of many.

original: sra mkhregs zhes pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: sra mkhregs zhes pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Solid means indivisible.

original: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: Vajra means emptiness.

original: bdag ces pa ni /
analyzed: bdag ces pa ni /
translated: Nature means

original: stong pa nyid kyis kun la khyab //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kun la khyab //
translated: Emptiness pervades everything.

original: ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'o na du ma dang bral ba'i lam du byed pas @183b lam mam yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na du ma dang bral ba'i lam du byed pas @183b lam mam yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Now, if it is asked whether there is the turbidity of the path or mental activity because the path is free from multiplicity, there is no turbidity.

original: skyes ma thag pa 'gro ba'i bdag / ces pa rtog pa'i dus nyan rang nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa sleb pa yin pas lam gyi rnyog pa med do //
analyzed: skyes ma thag pa 'gro ba'i bdag / ces pa rtog pa'i dus nyan rang nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa sleb pa yin pas lam gyi rnyog pa med do //
translated: Since the moment it arises, it is the nature of movement, the transcendent state of the buddhas is attained from the time of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'o na skyes ma thag zer bas na ye shes sems dpa' de rgyu rkyen las grub pas 'dus byas sam bcos mar song ngo zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na skyes ma thag zer bas na ye shes sems dpa' de rgyu rkyen las grub pas 'dus byas sam bcos mar song ngo zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Now, if it is said, ‚ÄúSince it is said to arise, that j√±ƒÅnasattva becomes conditioned because it is established from causes and conditions,‚Äù that is not so.

original: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
translated: Since it is said, ‚ÄúArisen from space, self-originated,‚Äù

original: zhes pa ste rgyu rkyen las ma bskyed pa yin pas na nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste rgyu rkyen las ma bskyed pa yin pas na nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
translated: since it is not generated from causes and conditions, it is similar to space.

original: rang byung bas na bcos ma'i rnyog pa med do //
analyzed: rang byung bas na bcos ma'i rnyog pa med do //
translated: Since it is self-originated, there is no turbidity of fabrication.

original: 'o na nam mkha' dang 'dra na nam mkha' la sems med pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na nam mkha' dang 'dra na nam mkha' la sems med pa ste /
translated: Now, if it is asked whether, if it is similar to space, space is without mind,

original: dran med kyi cha na 'dug pas chad lta'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: dran med kyi cha na 'dug pas chad lta'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: One may say: But since it is present in the state of non-memory, it is polluted by the view of annihilation.

original: shes rab ces pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab ces pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: Wisdom is emptiness.

original: ye shes ni rig pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni rig pa'o //

analyzed: rig pa dang stong pa dbyer mi phyed pas chad lta'i rnyog pa med do //
translated: Since awareness and emptiness are inseparable, it is not polluted by the view of annihilation.

original: me bo che zhes pa ni dbyer med des tha dad kyi rtog pa bsreg pas so //
analyzed: me bo che zhes pa ni dbyer med des tha dad kyi rtog pa bsreg pas so //
translated: As for great fire, it is so called because it burns the concepts of difference by means of that inseparability.

original: 'o na me bo che zhes pa ni mes bsregs nas dngos po med par byas pas na /
analyzed: 'o na me bo che zhes pa ni mes bsregs nas dngos po med par byas pas na /

original: dngos med kyi rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos med kyi rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: It is not so,

original: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
analyzed: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //

original: cas pas na dbyer med de ji ltar yang snang bas na dngos med kyi rnyog pa med do //
analyzed: cas pas na dbyer med de ji ltar yang snang bas na dngos med kyi rnyog pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since it appears in any way whatsoever by means of that inseparability, it is not polluted by non-existence.üîΩOne may say: But since, when it appears in any way whatsoever, the two, the object of appearance and the subject of appearance, occur, it is polluted by nescience.

original: 'o na ji ltar yang snang ba na snang bya snang byed gnyis byung bas ma rig pa'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yang snang ba na snang bya snang byed gnyis byung bas ma rig pa'i rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: It is not so,

original: ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
analyzed: ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
translated: for it is said: Star of wisdom, shining.

original: zhes pa ni dper na skar ma sprin gyis ma g-yogs pa ni lham me lhan ne lhang nger gar yang gsal ba bzhin ye shes des kyang mi mkhyen pa gang yang med pas na ma rig pa'i rnyog pa med do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dper na skar ma sprin gyis ma g-yogs pa ni lham me lhan ne lhang nger gar yang gsal ba bzhin ye shes des kyang mi mkhyen pa gang yang med pas na ma rig pa'i rnyog pa med do //
translated: Just as a star that is not obscured by clouds shines brightly, brightly, brightly, so too that intuition does not have any ignorance, and so there is no turbidity of nescience.

analyzed: 'o na lam me zhes pas na phyogs kyi rnyog pa yod do zhe na ma yin te /

analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi mar me dang 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi sgron me de la phyogs dang ris med pas na phyogs kyi rnyog pa med do //
translated: No, it is not so, because that lamp of intuition, which is like a lamp for transmigrators, does not have any directions or parts, and so there is no turbidity of directions.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' de kho na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' de kho na /
translated: That intuition hero is

analyzed: nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: 'gro ba kun dga' ba'i ye shes kyi mig dad ldan na sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //

analyzed: drang srong zhes pa ni skyon med pa ste sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: zhags pa ni snying rje'o //

original: rdo rje gcig pu g-yul sel ba //
analyzed: rdo rje gcig pu g-yul sel ba //
translated: The single vajra conquers the battle.

original: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba bzlog pa'o //
translated: This is the reversal of samsara through emptiness.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzang //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzang //
translated: The vajra blaze is the evil eye.

original: ces pa ni ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is having the eye of wisdom.

original: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
translated: The hair is the vajra blaze.

original: zhes pa ni dbu skra'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dbu skra'o //
translated: This is the hair.

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che /
translated: The vajra descent is the great descent.

original: zhes pa ni rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the consecration.üîΩThe hundred eyes are the vajra eyes.

original: @185a * // mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig / ces pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: @185a * // mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig / ces pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is having inconceivable eyes.

original: lus ni rdo rje'i ba sbu can //
analyzed: lus ni rdo rje'i ba sbu can //
translated: The body has the vajra pores.

original: zhes pa ni ba sbu thams cad rdo rje phra mor gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ba sbu thams cad rdo rje phra mor gnas pa'o //
translated: This is all the pores existing as subtle vajras.

original: rdo rje spu ni gcig bu'i lus //
analyzed: rdo rje spu ni gcig bu'i lus //
translated: The body of the single vajra hair.

original: zhes pa ni lus thams cad rdo rjes khyab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni lus thams cad rdo rjes khyab pa'o //
translated: This means that the whole body is pervaded by vajras.

original: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse //
analyzed: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse //
translated: The nails are born as vajra-tips.

original: zhes pa ni yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad rdo rje'i rtse mo lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad rdo rje'i rtse mo lta bu'o //
translated: This means that all the major and minor body parts are like vajra-tips.

original: rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs //
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs //
translated: The vajra-essence has tough skin.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i pags pa dang ldan no //üîΩrdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i pags pa dang ldan no // rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
translated: This means that he has vajra skin.üîΩHe is glorious, wearing a vajra garland.

original: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
translated: He is adorned with vajra ornaments.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This means that he has vajra ornaments.

original: gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //
analyzed: gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //
translated: He proclaims the laughter ha ha.

original: zhes pa ni zil gyis mi non pa'i gsung ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zil gyis mi non pa'i gsung ngo //
translated: This means that his speech is invincible.

original: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
translated: The vajra sound of the six syllables.

original: zhes pa ni aa ra pa tsa na ya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni aa ra pa tsa na ya'o //
translated: This means the six-syllable mantra.

original: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
analyzed: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
translated: The great Ma√±jugho·π£a has a great sound.

original: zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: This means the wisdom being.

original: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
translated: The one sound in the three worlds.

original: zhes pa ni srid pa gsum na ma thos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni srid pa gsum na ma thos pa med pa'o //
translated: This means that there is nothing unheard in the three existences.

original: nam mkha'i khams na sgra sgrogs pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams na sgra sgrogs pa //
translated: The sound that resounds in the realm of space.

original: zhes pa ni nam mkhas gar khyab par 'gro ba la zab pa dang rgya che ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni nam mkhas gar khyab par 'gro ba la zab pa dang rgya che ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'o //
translated: This means that wherever space pervades, the sounds of the profound and vast resound.üîΩThe supreme of those endowed with sound

original: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa ni 'du byed rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: means that it becomes the supreme of all compounded phenomena.

original: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
translated: The true absence of self is suchness.

original: ces pa ni gang zag gi bdag dang chos kyi bdag gis stong pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni gang zag gi bdag dang chos kyi bdag gis stong pa'o //
translated: This means that it is empty of the self of persons and the self of phenomena.

original: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
analyzed: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
translated: The limit of reality is without syllables.

original: ces pa ni tshig dang tha snyad las 'das pa ste lta ba stor /
analyzed: ces pa ni tshig dang tha snyad las 'das pa ste lta ba stor /
translated: This means that it is beyond words and conventions, the view is lost,

original: tha snyad nub /
analyzed: tha snyad nub /
translated: conventions disappear,

original: grub mtha' thams cad bag la zha ba'o //
analyzed: grub mtha' thams cad bag la zha ba'o //
translated: and all tenets subside.

original: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
analyzed: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
translated: The supreme of those who speak of emptiness

original: zhes pa ni ston pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ston pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: means that among all teachers, the supreme is the j√±ƒÅnasattva.üîΩProfound

original: zab cing zhes pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa'o //
analyzed: zab cing zhes pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa'o //
translated: refers to the vehicle of secret mantra.üîΩVast

original: rgya che ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'o //
analyzed: rgya che ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'o //
translated: refers to the vehicle of the perfections.üîΩThe sound that resounds

original: sgra sgrogs pa ni gdul bya la'o //
analyzed: sgra sgrogs pa ni gdul bya la'o //
translated: is for the sake of those to be tamed.

original: chos kyi drung ste sgra chen ldan //
analyzed: chos kyi drung ste sgra chen ldan //
translated: He is the Dharma-drum, the Great Sound.

original: zhes pa ni zab mo ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zab mo ston pa'o //
translated: This shows the profound.

original: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
analyzed: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
translated: He is the great sound of the Dharma-essence.

original: zhes pa ni rgya che ba ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgya che ba ston pa'o //
translated: This shows the extensive.

original: de ltar ston pa'i ye shes sems dpa' de'i ngo bo ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar ston pa'i ye shes sems dpa' de'i ngo bo ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of that wisdom being who teaches in this way?

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'o //
translated: He is the non-abiding nirvana.

original: zhes bya ste mtha' dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ste mtha' dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means he is free from extremes.

original: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che //
translated: He is the great Dharma-drum of the ten directions.

original: zhes pa ni thams cad la khyab par ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni thams cad la khyab par ston pa'o //
translated: This shows he pervades everything.

original: gzugs med ces pa ni chos sku'o //
analyzed: gzugs med ces pa ni chos sku'o //
translated: Formless is the dharmakaya.

original: gzugs bzang dam pa ni longs sku'o //
analyzed: gzugs bzang dam pa ni longs sku'o //
translated: Supreme beautiful form is the sambhogakaya.

original: sna tshogs @185b gzugs can yid las skyes //üîΩgzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
analyzed: sna tshogs @185b gzugs can yid las skyes // gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
translated: Having various forms, he is born from the mind.üîΩThe glory of the appearance of all forms,

original: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chad ba po //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chad ba po //
translated: The expounder of all reflections,

original: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: This is the nirmanakaya.

original: yang na yid las skyes zhes pa ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: yang na yid las skyes zhes pa ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lta ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, born from the mind is the view of the Yogachara.

original: mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags //
translated: Incomparable, renowned as great,

original: zhes pa ni 'dra ba med cing kun la khyab pa'i don no //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dra ba med cing kun la khyab pa'i don no //
translated: This means that he is without equal and pervades all.

original: khams gsum ni 'dod khams la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum ni 'dod khams la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three realms are the desire realm and so forth.

original: dbang phyug ni de la mnga' brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ni de la mnga' brnyes pa'o //
translated: The lord is the one who has attained power over them.

original: 'phags lam ni yan lag brgyad do //
analyzed: 'phags lam ni yan lag brgyad do //
translated: The noble path is the eightfold path.

original: mtho la gnas zhes pa ni sa bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: mtho la gnas zhes pa ni sa bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: The one who dwells on high is the eleventh bhumi.

original: dar ba chen po zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa ste yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dar ba chen po zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa ste yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The one of great prosperity is the one who is expansive and endowed with all good qualities.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni 'khor 'das thams cad do //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni 'khor 'das thams cad do //
translated: The Dharma is all of samsara and nirvana.

original: tog ces pa ni de dag gi rtse mor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: tog ces pa ni de dag gi rtse mor gyur pa'o //
translated: The crest is the one who is at the peak of those.

original: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa ni 'dod khams la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum zhes pa ni 'dod khams la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three worlds are the desire realm and so forth.

original: gzhon lus gcig ces pa ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhon lus gcig ces pa ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'o //
translated: The youthful body is Manjushri the youthful.

original: gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag / ces pa ni 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag / ces pa ni 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: The elder, the old one, the lord of beings, is the one who acts for the benefit of beings through being an arya arhat.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa ni bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / yan lag gi spu g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa ni bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / yan lag gi spu g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: The thirty-two are the thirty-two ornaments, such as the seven prominent parts of the body, long fingers, broad heels, a large body, hair growing upwards, and a face adorned with the ≈´r·πáƒÅ hair-coil.

original: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
analyzed: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
translated: Beautiful, pleasing to the three worlds,

original: zhes pa ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar dmar ba la sogs pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar dmar ba la sogs pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: means endowed with the eighty minor marks, such as nails the color of copper.

original: 'jig rten zhes pa ni 'khor ba rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes pa ni 'khor ba rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
translated: World means knowing samsara to be without intrinsic nature.

original: legs zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
analyzed: legs zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa rang bzhin med par shes pa'o //
translated: Good means knowing nirvana to be without intrinsic nature.

original: slob dpon zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: Master means the wisdom being.

original: 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med //
translated: World master, fearless,

original: ces pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: means becoming the chief of beings.

original: mgon dang skyob pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mgon dang skyob pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Protector and refuge means nirvana.

original: 'jig rten ni 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni 'khor ba'o //
translated: The world is samsara.

original: yid gcugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba la mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: yid gcugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba la mdzes pa'o //
translated: The beloved is the one who is dear to beings.

original: skyabs dang zhes bya ba ni gdul bya ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: skyabs dang zhes bya ba ni gdul bya ma lus pa'o //
translated: The refuge is all those to be trained.

original: skyob pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul byed do //
analyzed: skyob pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul byed do //
translated: The protector is the one who trains.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni do zla dang bral ba ste ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni do zla dang bral ba ste ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The unsurpassed is the wisdom being, free from rivals.

original: 'on gdul bya ji tsam gyi don byed ce na /
analyzed: 'on gdul bya ji tsam gyi don byed ce na /
translated: But how much benefit does he bring to those to be trained?

original: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //üîΩzhes @186a * //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa // zhes @186a * //
translated: He enjoys to the ends of space.

original: bya ste nam mkhas gar khyab pa'i gdul bya la don bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bya ste nam mkhas gar khyab pa'i gdul bya la don bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that he acts for the benefit of those to be trained wherever space pervades.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho ni ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho ni ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The ocean of omniscient wisdom is the wisdom that knows everything that exists.

original: nges 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni /
analyzed: nges 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni /
translated: The meaning of he acts for the benefit of those who go astray is as follows:

original: ma rig sgo ba'i sbubs 'byed pa //
analyzed: ma rig sgo ba'i sbubs 'byed pa //
translated: He opens the egg of the hen of ignorance.

original: zhes bya ste ma rig pa ni las rgyu 'bras dang / dkon mchog dang bden pa dag yod par mi shes te /
analyzed: zhes bya ste ma rig pa ni las rgyu 'bras dang / dkon mchog dang bden pa dag yod par mi shes te /
translated: Ignorance is the lack of knowledge of the causes and effects of karma, the three jewels, and the truths.

original: thar ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sgrib pas sgo nga'i sbubs dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: thar ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sgrib pas sgo nga'i sbubs dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is like the shell of an egg, because it obscures liberation and nirvana.

original: 'byed pa zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i ling tog sel bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'byed pa zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i ling tog sel bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The word cleaves means removes the cataract of ignorance.

original: srid pa ni gsum mo //
analyzed: srid pa ni gsum mo //
translated: The three existences are the three realms of desire, form, and formlessness.

original: dra ba ni ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: dra ba ni ma rig pa'o //
translated: The net is ignorance.

original: 'joms pa ni rlag par byed pa'o //üîΩma rig pa 'ba' zhig brlag par ma zad kyi /
analyzed: 'joms pa ni rlag par byed pa'o // ma rig pa 'ba' zhig brlag par ma zad kyi /
translated: The destroyer is the one who destroys it.

original: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhi bar byed do //
translated: Not only does he destroy ignorance, but he also pacifies all afflictions.

original: 'khor ba ni skye rga na 'chi bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba ni skye rga na 'chi bzhi'o //
translated: The four are birth, aging, sickness, and death.

original: rgya mtsho ni rgal bar dka' ba'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho ni rgal bar dka' ba'o //
translated: The ocean is difficult to cross.

original: pha rol phyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The other shore is nirvana.

original: ye shes ni ye nas gnas pa'i don shes pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni ye nas gnas pa'i don shes pa'o //
translated: The wisdom is the knowledge of the primordial meaning.

original: dbang bskur ni de la dbang thob pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ni de la dbang thob pa'o //
translated: The empowerment is the attainment of power over that.

original: cod pan ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ste /
analyzed: cod pan ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ste /
translated: The crown is the ornament of perfect complete buddhahood.

original: rnam par snang mdzad mgo la khur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mgo la khur ba'o //
translated: It is Vairocana placed on the head.

original: sdug bsngal gsum zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gsum zhes pa ni /
translated: The three sufferings are the suffering of suffering, the suffering of change, and the suffering of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal lo //
translated: The suffering of formations, the suffering of change, and the suffering of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal zhes pa ni brgyad do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes pa ni brgyad do //
translated: ‚Äú Suffering‚Äù is eightfold.

original: zhi zhes pa ni de las grol ba'o //
analyzed: zhi zhes pa ni de las grol ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Peace‚Äù is liberation from that.

original: gsum sel zhes pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi dag pa'o //
analyzed: gsum sel zhes pa ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi dag pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Eliminating the three‚Äù is the purification of body, speech, and mind.

original: mtha' yas zhes pa ni ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas zhes pa ni ma lus pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Infinite‚Äù is without exception.

original: grol gsum thob ces pa ni sku gsum mo //
analyzed: grol gsum thob ces pa ni sku gsum mo //
translated: ‚Äú Attaining the three liberations‚Äù is the three bodies.

original: sgrib pa kun zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú All obscurations‚Äù are the afflictive obscurations and the knowledge obscurations.

original: nges par grol zhes pa ni dag pa'o //
analyzed: nges par grol zhes pa ni dag pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Definitely liberated‚Äù is pure.

original: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
analyzed: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the equality of space,

original: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
analyzed: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
translated: beyond all the stains of afflictions,

original: zhes pa ni mnyam gzhag go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mnyam gzhag go //
translated: is meditative equipoise.

original: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
analyzed: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
translated: The one who realizes the three times as timeless

original: zhes pa ni rjes thob bo //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rjes thob bo //
translated: is postmeditation.

original: sems can kun zhes pa ni 'gro ba ris drug go //
analyzed: sems can kun zhes pa ni 'gro ba ris drug go //
translated: ‚Äú All sentient beings‚Äù are the six kinds of beings.

original: gtso bo zhes pa ni sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes pa ni sangs rgyas so //
translated: ‚Äú Chief‚Äù is the Buddha.

original: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
analyzed: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
translated: The crown of those with the best qualities,

original: ces pa ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: This refers to the Bodhisattvas on the ten stages.

original: thod ces pa de rnams kyi thod du gyur pa ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: thod ces pa de rnams kyi thod du gyur pa ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: The head is the gnosis being, who is the head of those.

original: lus zhes pa ni gzugs so //
analyzed: lus zhes pa ni gzugs so //
translated: The body is form.

original: kun zhes pa ni sgra dang dri la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kun zhes pa ni sgra dang dri la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: kun zhes pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i sa'o //

analyzed: yang dag ye shes zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //

analyzed: brtson chen zhes pa ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa ste sprul pa'i sku'o //

analyzed: sgyu ni stong pa nyid do //

analyzed: 'phrul ni sna tshogs su shar ba'o //

analyzed: dra ba ni gnyis su med pa'i don to //

analyzed: rgyud kyi ngo bo dang / nges tshig dang / dbye ba dang / mtshan nyid dang / rnam grangs dang / las so //

analyzed: po mchog ces bya'o //

analyzed: 'byung ba sel zhes pa ni 'khor ba las sgrol ba'o //
translated: The line ‚Äúdispelling the elements‚Äù refers to liberation from sa·πÉsƒÅra.

analyzed: zhes pa ni gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //

analyzed: dper na sgyu ru ra rlon pa lag mthil du bzhag pa lta bu'o // ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //

analyzed: dam pa ste zhes pa ni sa bcu gcig pa mthar phyin pa'o //

analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //

analyzed: ces pa ni go sla'o //

analyzed: dgra ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang ngo //

analyzed: dregs pa ni nga rgyal lo //

analyzed: 'joms zhes pa ni sel bar byed pa'o //

analyzed: dpal ldan zhes pa ni gzugs sku gnyis so //

analyzed: blo dang zhes pa ni rig pa ste chos sku'o //

original: sgeg par ldan zhes pa ni 'khor ba las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: sgeg par ldan zhes pa ni 'khor ba las 'das pa'o //
translated: To play is to transcend cyclic existence.

original: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
analyzed: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //

analyzed: zhes pa ni khro bo'i gzugs 'di dag gis lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing /

analyzed: gom pa'i stobs kyis ci rigs pa'i gar bya'o //

analyzed: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //

analyzed: zhes pa ni yan lag gi khyad par ro //

analyzed: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //

analyzed: sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi @191a * //

original: khyon ; / zhes pa ni gnas kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyon ; / zhes pa ni gnas kyi khyad par ro //

original: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //

original: zhes pa ni 'dug stangs kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dug stangs kyi khyad par ro //

analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //

original: zhes pa ni che ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni che ba'i khyad par ro //

analyzed: de ltar ye shes sems dpa' de khro ba'i gzugs khyad par de dag dang ldan pas 'gro ba'i don byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: khro bo'i bstod pa dag kyang bya ste /

original: g-yas brkyang dang / g-yon brkyang dang / zlum po dang / sa ga dag kyang bya ste /
analyzed: g-yas brkyang dang / g-yon brkyang dang / zlum po dang / sa ga dag kyang bya ste /

analyzed: phyi nas ni ci bder cho ga la 'jug par bya'o // don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
