analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te ji ltar 'gro ba dang mthun pa'i don byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // lha yi dbang po zhes bya ba khyab 'jug go //
translated: This means that he acts for the welfare of beings in whatever way is appropriate to them.üîΩThe ‚Äúlord of the gods‚Äù is Vishnu.

original: lha'i bdag po zhes pa ni brgya byin no //
analyzed: lha'i bdag po zhes pa ni brgya byin no //
translated: The ‚Äúlord of the gods‚Äù is Indra.

original: lha min bdag ces pa ni r'a hu la'o //
analyzed: lha min bdag ces pa ni r'a hu la'o //
translated: The ‚Äúlord of the demigods‚Äù is Rahula.

original: lha yi bla zhes pa ni gza' phur bu'o //
analyzed: lha yi bla zhes pa ni gza' phur bu'o //
translated: The ‚Äúlord of the gods‚Äù is the planet Mars.

original: 'joms byed ces pa ni lha ma yin gyi bdag po thags ba zangs ris so //
analyzed: 'joms byed ces pa ni lha ma yin gyi bdag po thags ba zangs ris so //
translated: The ‚Äúdestroyer‚Äù is the lord of the demigods, Vemacitrin.

original: 'joms byed phyi mas ni srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcu /
analyzed: 'joms byed phyi mas ni srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcu /
translated: The ‚Äúdestroyer‚Äù at the end of the line is the king of the rakshasas, Ravana.

original: dbang phyug ces ba ni ma h'a de ba'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ces ba ni ma h'a de ba'o //
translated: The ‚ÄúMaheshvara‚Äù is Mahadeva.

original: 'dir rgal ba /
analyzed: 'dir rgal ba /
translated: Here, someone might object,

original: 'o na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khyod 'jig rten pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang bas na srid pa'i nyes pas gos par thal lo zhe na ma yin te ;
analyzed: 'o na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khyod 'jig rten pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang bas na srid pa'i nyes pas gos par thal lo zhe na ma yin te ;
translated: ‚ÄúWell, since Manjushri, the wisdom deity, appears in various worldly forms, it follows that he is tainted by the faults of existence.‚Äù

original: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
analyzed: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
translated: He has crossed the desert of existence.

original: zhes smos te srid pa ni gsum mo //
analyzed: zhes smos te srid pa ni gsum mo //
translated: Existence refers to the three realms.

original: dgon pa ni srid pa'i chos la don med pa ste stong pa'o //
analyzed: dgon pa ni srid pa'i chos la don med pa ste stong pa'o //
translated: The monastery is the emptiness of the phenomena of the world.

original: las brgal ba zhes pa ni srid pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i don to //
analyzed: las brgal ba zhes pa ni srid pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i don to //
translated: The crossing of the action means the meaning of not being defiled by the faults of the world.

original: ston pa gcig pu zhes pa ni 'gran zla med pa'o //
analyzed: ston pa gcig pu zhes pa ni 'gran zla med pa'o //
translated: The sole teacher means without rival.

original: 'gro ba'i bla zhes pa ni gong na med @197b pa'o ;üîΩ/'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla zhes pa ni gong na med @197b pa'o ; /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
translated: The leader of the world means without anything above it.

analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' de las gong na med pa 'gran zla med pa zhes grags so //
translated: The world's fame means that the wisdom being is known as without anything above it, without rival.

original: chos kyi spyin bdag chen po zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i don ston pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi spyin bdag chen po zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i don ston pa'o //
translated: The great lord of the Dharma means teaching the meaning of the uncontaminated.

original: byams pa'i zhes pa ni thams cad la bu gcig pa'i pha ltar dgongs pa'o//
analyzed: byams pa'i zhes pa ni thams cad la bu gcig pa'i pha ltar dgongs pa'o//
translated: The loving means the intention of all, like a father to his only son.

original: go cha ni bar chod bsrung ba ste zhe sdang gis mi tshugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: go cha ni bar chod bsrung ba ste zhe sdang gis mi tshugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The armor means protecting from obstacles, meaning not being overcome by hatred.

original: snying rje'i zhes pa ni sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa can no //
analyzed: snying rje'i zhes pa ni sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa can no //

analyzed: ya lad bgos zhes pa ni stod g-yogs so //

original: stod g-yogs kyi go cha de lta bus 'gro ba'i don rgyun mi 'chad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: stod g-yogs kyi go cha de lta bus 'gro ba'i don rgyun mi 'chad do zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
analyzed: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
translated: Holding a sword of wisdom, a bow and arrow,

original: zhes pa ni phyag mtshan te go sla'o //
